com.centuryglass.mcmap.mapping

Class MapImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.centuryglass.mcmap.mapping.MapImage

  • public class MapImage
extends Object
    MapImage is a wrapper for a PNG image object, providing functions useful for drawing Minecraft map data. In addition to providing convenience functions for coloring specific map chunks, the MapImage also optionally draws a background and border resembling the Minecraft map item.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MapImage(String imagePath, int widthInChunks, int heightInChunks, int pixelsPerChunk, boolean drawBackground)
      Loads image data on construction, and optionally draws the default background and border.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MapImage

        public MapImage(String imagePath,
                int widthInChunks,
                int heightInChunks,
                int pixelsPerChunk,
                boolean drawBackground)
        Loads image data on construction, and optionally draws the default background and border.
        Parameters:
        imagePath - The path where the image will be saved.
        widthInChunks - The map's width, measured in chunks.
        heightInChunks - The map's height, measured in chunks.
        pixelsPerChunk - The width and height in pixels of each chunk.
        drawBackground - Whether the default background and borders are drawn.

    • Method Detail

      • getPixelColor

        public Color getPixelColor(int xPos,
                           int yPos)
        Gets the color of a specific image pixel.
        Parameters:
        xPos - The pixel's x-coordinate.
        yPos - The pixel's y-coordinate.
        Returns:
        The color value at the given coordinate, or Color(0) if the coordinate is out of bounds.

      • getChunkColor

        public Color getChunkColor(int xPos,
                           int zPos)
        Gets the color applied to a specific chunk.
        Parameters:
        xPos - The chunk's x-coordinate.
        zPos - The chunk's z-coordinate.
        Returns:
        The color value at the given coordinate, or Color(0) if the coordinate is out of bounds.

      • setPixelColor

        public void setPixelColor(int xPos,
                          int yPos,
                          Color color)
        Sets the color of a specific image pixel.
        Parameters:
        xPos - The pixel's x-coordinate.
        yPos - The pixel's y-coordinate.
        color - The color value to apply.

      • setChunkColor

        public void setChunkColor(int xPos,
                          int zPos,
                          Color color)
        Sets the color of a specific chunk.
        Parameters:
        xPos - The chunk's x-coordinate.
        zPos - The chunk's z-coordinate.
        color - The color value to apply.

      • saveImage

        public void saveImage()
        Saves the image to its output path.

      • getWidthInChunks

        public int getWidthInChunks()
        Gets the width of the image, measured in Minecraft map chunks.
        Returns:
        The map width.

      • getHeightInChunks

        public int getHeightInChunks()
        Gets the height of the image, measured in Minecraft map chunks.
        Returns:
        The map height.

      • getChunkEdgeLength

        public int getChunkEdgeLength()
        Gets the length in pixels of each chunk edge within the map.
        Returns:
        The chunk pixel dimensions. This serves as the multiplier used when converting map dimensions from chunks to pixels.
